welcome_message_body: Welcome to Palangkaraya, where the lush rainforests and rich cultural heritage await you. Take in the beauty of the Kahayan River, explore the traditional Dayak longhouses, and savor the local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in our charming city.
